name: About Currency
description: a peculiar currency with you here

pages.text: You seem out of place with everything in this world, like a sinner exiled in the wilderness.$(br)   Your past has been washed away without a trace. As you look at the necklace and books in your hands, and at the villagers around you, you feel both unfamiliar and familiar.

With you here is a peculiar currency. They have no physical form, only a quantity. This has piqued the interest of the natives who trade with green stones and the Atum people who trade with gold coins. .$(br)  However, that's about it.They cannot use this currency, so they can only watch.$(br)  Currently, these currencies can only be exchanged for very limited goods.
You may use the currency in the shop on top right corner in ftbquest.
